input.sentences: my cousin has a huge farm with lots of animals . this is his greyhound pepper .
this turtle was n't here since last time i saw him | but its name is soup .
this is his little sister 's ferret moocow .
he had to get a license to own an owl but this is his owl named birdbrain .
output.sentences: Pepper is a huge dog who spends lots of time at the zoo.
His sister Cinnamon, the greyhound, likes to come too.
When he sees the turtle he barks, "It's time to make soup!"
But Moocow the mean ferret growls at them when they get too close to the turtle.
As they run from the zoo an owl named License watches them from her perch.
